title: ReqText_Terminal_Editor
description: Interactive terminal editor for ReqText.

title: AI Instructions
description: Instructions for the AI to follow when generating code.

title: NEVER Generate reqt_ids
description: reqt_id files in the json must be generated by the ReqText application.

title: ALWAYS add graceful debugging to console
description: Instructions for graceful debugging in the console so that AI can easily view the code behaviour.

title: ALWAYS run scripts and/or test after Changes
description: Whenever possible run the scripts and/or test after making changes to the code and review the terminal output.

title: NEVER Mark a reqt PASS without approval
description: DESCRIPTION

title: ALWAYS update documentation help, and menus
description: ALWAYS update documentation, help, and menus after making changes to the code.

title: ReqText Terminal Editor Reqs
description: This section contains the requirements for the ReqText Terminal Editor.

title: Use the flathier-fhr- library
description: Use 'import fhr from @terzitech/flathier'

title: imrove: ANSI code displaying
description: DESCRIPTION

title: Navigation
description: Navigation in the editor is done using the arrow keys.

title: ONLY use std.out in the editor
description: In the renderer console.log cannot be used, only std.out. There are newline characters already in the tree.

title: Clear on Quit
description: After quiting clear the console.

title: keypress a for add
description: DESCRIPTION

title: Use the add after handler
description: Use the same add after handler as the one in the main.js file.

title: Delete Selected Item
description: Delete the currently selected item. --delete and -d are the commands.

title: Make Selected Item a Child
description: Make the currently selected item a child of the one above it. use the right arrow key to do this.

title: Use flathier.demote
description: Use the flather.demote function to demote the selected item.

title: Make Selected Item a Sibling
description:
Use the flathier.promote function to promote the selected item. 
 
 Use the left arrow key to do this.

title: Move Item Up
description:
Use the flather.moveUp function to move the selected item up. 
 
 Use k.
